fields.description: Production Plan -> Create button shows "Work Order / Subcontract PO". This setting hides it and shows 2 separate button for each.
fields.label: Seperate Work Order and SCO buttons in Production Plan

fields.description: The Planned Quantity is calculated by taking into account the quantity of sales orders, work orders, and delivered items. This check ensures that the calculations also consider the quantity in active production plans.
fields.label: Production Plan must check already planned qty

fields.description: Create button in Sales Order will also have Production Plan option.
fields.label: Create Production Plan from Sales Orders

fields.description: Create button in Sales Order will also have Manufacture option. This enables users to bypass Work Order creation and creates Manufacture Stock Entry on the fly.
fields.label: Create Manufacture Stock Entry from Sales Order

fields.description: Shows variant selection grid above items grid if enabled. It provides easy item selection.
fields.label: Show Variant Template in Material Request
Show Variant Template in Stock Reconciliation
